DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to analyze the different patient profiles implanted with an Implantable Cardiac Defibrillator (ICD) in Spain (guidelines adoption) and the patient prognosis as a function of clinical profile, implant indication, arrhythmias incidence, treatments or device programming.
DOC.brief_title: UMBRELLA - Incidence of Arrhythmias in Spanish Population With a Medtronic Implantable Cardiac Defibrillator Implant
DOC.detailed_description: Umbrella is a prospective and retrospective cohort study.
DOC.criteria: Patients with a Medtronic Implantable Cardiac Defibrillator (ICD) according to guidelines. Patients with CareLink home Telemonitoring System. Unwillingness or inability to sign study written informed consent and/or CareLink consent.
